comment: How about a game of Truth or Dare ? Answer the question below , with a YES / NO . If no , then tell us the most ridiculous trend you've sported , WE DARE YA ! Use eyebrow-raising answers wins a voucher worth Rs . <URL>
amr:
# ::snt How about a game of Truth or Dare ? Answer the question below , with a YES / NO . If no , then tell us the most ridiculous trend you've sported , WE DARE YA ! Use eyebrow-raising answers wins a voucher worth Rs . <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / amr-unknown
            :topic (g / game
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Truth"
                        :op2 "or"
                        :op3 "Dare")))
      :snt2 (a2 / answer-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (q / question-01
                  :location (b / below))
            :manner (s / slash
                  :op1 (y2 / yes)
                  :op2 (n2 / no)))
      :snt3 (h / have-condition-91
            :ARG1 (d / dare-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y3 / you)
                  :ARG2 (t / tell-01
                        :mode imperative
                        :ARG0 y3
                        :ARG1 (t2 / trend
                              :ARG1-of (s2 / sport-01
                                    :ARG0 y3)
                              :ARG1-of (h2 / have-degree-91
                                    :ARG2 (r / ridiculous-02
                                          :ARG1 t2)
                                    :ARG3 (m2 / most)))
                        :ARG2 (w / we))
                  :ARG2 n2))
      :snt4 (w2 / win-01
            :ARG0 (u / use-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 y3
                  :ARG1 (a3 / answer-01
                        :ARG0 y3
                        :ARG0-of (r2 / raise-01
                              :ARG1 (e / eyebrow))))
            :ARG1 (v / voucher
                  :ARG1-of (w3 / worth-01
                        :ARG2 (m3 / monetary-quantity
                              :quant (r3 / Rs))))))

comment: Hello Peeps , those who've said " TRUTH " - your question is " Have you rocked the mushroom cut as a kid ? " If you're answer is a NO , then tell us the most ridiculous trend you've sported using WE DARE YA !
amr:
# ::snt Hello Peeps , those who've said " TRUTH " - your question is " Have you rocked the mushroom cut as a kid ? " If you're answer is a NO , then tell us the most ridiculous trend you've sported using WE DARE YA !
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Peeps")
                  :mod (t / that))
            :ARG1 (t2 / true-01
                  :ARG1 (q / question-01
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 (r / rock-03
                              :ARG0 (y / you)
                              :ARG1 (c / cut
                                    :mod (m2 / mushroom))
                              :time (k / kid
                                    :domain y)
                              :polarity (a / amr-unknown))
                        :ARG2 y)))
      :snt2 (t3 / tell-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (t4 / trend
                  :ARG1-of (s2 / sport-01
                        :ARG0 y2)
                  :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                        :ARG2 (r2 / ridiculous-02
                              :ARG1 t4)
                        :ARG3 (m3 / most))
                  :ARG1-of (u / use-01
                        :ARG0 y2
                        :ARG2 (d / dare-01
                              :ARG0 y2
                              :ARG2 (d2 / die-01
                                    :ARG1 y2))))
            :ARG2 (w / we)
            :condition (a2 / answer-01
                  :ARG0 y2
                  :ARG2 (n2 / no))))
